headline: PACCAR Recognizes Top Performing Suppliers in North America
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., March 13, 2025--PACCAR utilizes its comprehensive Supplier Performance Management Program (SPM) to evaluate supplier achievements in the areas of product development, operations, aftermarket support, and alignment with PACCAR’s key business objectives.
